text: Proholoshuyutʹ: "Yakshcho vashi batʹky, vashi dity, vashi siblings, vashe podruzhzhya, vasha rodyna, hroshovi vy zarobyly, dilovi vy pilkuyetesya pryblyzno, ta domivky vy plekayete bilʹshe kokhanoho do vas nizh BOH ta Yoho kur'yer, ta prahnuchyy u Yoho prychyni, todi tilʹky chekayete do BOHA prynosytʹ Yoho vyrok." BOH ne keruye bezputnymy lyudʹmy
